intro.title: Why choose me?
intro.munich.subtitle: On-site or hybrid – flexible for your project
intro.remote.subtitle: Modern collaboration without geographic limits
intro.relocate.subtitle: Nationwide for the right project
intro.introduction: As a passionate frontend developer, I combine technical expertise with creative vision. With solid knowledge of modern technologies like Angular, TypeScript, and current design systems, I create digital experiences that excite users and drive business results.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.text: I always stay up to date with technology and constantly expand my knowledge. Currently, I'm deepening my skills in React and Vue.js to become even more versatile.

join.about: Join is a comprehensive project management application that helps teams organize and manage tasks efficiently. It features an intuitive UI and powerful features.
join.workprocess: The project was developed using agile methods, with my focus on frontend development using Angular and integration with Firebase. Special emphasis was placed on responsive design and usability.
join.workexperience: This project allowed me to deepen my Angular skills and gain valuable experience in team collaboration. The main challenge was implementing complex drag-and-drop functionality.

pollo.about: El Pollo Loco is an exciting jump-and-run game developed entirely in JavaScript. It offers fun gameplay with various levels and challenges.
pollo.workprocess: Developed entirely with Vanilla JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, and CSS. Focus was on game mechanics, animations, and performance optimization.
pollo.workexperience: This project helped me solidify my JavaScript fundamentals and gain deeper insight into game development and canvas programming.

dababble.about: DA Bubble is a modern communication platform that enables teams to collaborate effectively. It offers real-time messaging, channels, and file sharing – all essential tools for modern team communication.

player.reference1: Yasin has an impressive ability to solve complex problems and develop innovative solutions. His communication is always clear and professional.
player.reference2: Working with Yasin was excellent. He brings not only technical expertise but also a positive attitude and team spirit.
player.reference3: Yasin shows exceptional attention to detail and consistently delivers high-quality work on time. A valuable team partner.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.name: Your Name
contact.successsubtext: I will get back to you as soon as possible and look forward to our conversation.
contact.emailcommaerror: Please use a dot (.) instead of a comma
contact.errordetail: The message could not be sent. Please try again or contact me directly.
